original_text: Remember that I used five loaves of bread to feed 5,000 men. How many baskets did you fill with pieces of food that were left?’
korean_text: 내가 떡 다섯 개를 오천 명에게 떼어 줄 때에 조각 몇 바구니를 거두었더냐 이르되 열둘이니이다

sentences.original_text: Remember that I used five loaves of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 빵 다섯 개를 사용했다는 것을 기억하라

sentences.original_text: How many baskets did you fill
with pieces of food that were left
